roleset.name: covertly gathering intelligence
roleset.note: RECONNAISSANCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia. (from reconnaissance.01-n)

example.name: args 0, 1 LVB
example.text: Before beginning the work, he made a preliminary reconnaissance of the fortifications on the south of the town from the Valley Gate, which was near the S.E..
example.arg: of the fortifications on the south of the town from the Valley Gate, which was near the S.E.
